message: My daughter is 25. This girl was barely out of college. Some mothers best friend. A fathers everlasting joy. This would kill me. I can only imagine her parents suffering. I am so sorry for their grief and loss. May they both R.I.P.

Hunting is conservation. All the meat is eaten (by locals mostly) and the money goes directly to the people doing the actual protection/conservation work. People who think that donations and photo safaris are going to fix the problem are Saving these animals to death.

I did swim with them off the coast of the Big Island. The state tightly regulates how many boats can take out swimmers and how close you can get. They are not stressed at all. A mom and calf swam within 6 feet of my wife and daughter. Most of them stayed 25-30 feet away. They are intelligent and very curious. Too many animal rights people have their underwear on too tight.
